thread.section_title: Servicing Stop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.servicingstop.co.uk
thread.title: Trusty

author: Trusty
title: Trusty
text: Only use if you are happy for a staranger to drive 40 to 50 miles away from your home . Also check with the company where your car is going as the email they send you may not be the garage that it is actually going to .The fuel that they will use and wear and tear on your car may be cheaper taking it closer to home for what it is worth. Only sounds cheap ! Only good thing was the confirmation / cancelling of booking was very quick .
